content.label: I really sat here and played a mobile game for 2 hours straight. This game is the one and it‚Äôs definitely my all time top 5 even competiting with console and pc games. The story‚Äôs phenomenal, the characters are all so beautifully designed and memorable. All the choices actually have weight to them and change the course of the story and you get rewarded for exploring the big world. If you have the means to please buy the full version, you don‚Äôt know me but I‚Äôm telling you it‚Äôs worth every penny and it will leave you very happy

this review is not gonna be long.i really love the game so far i love the plot i even have two favorite characters‚ú®,but one thing that bums me out is that it costs money,it‚Äôs probably worth every penny but i‚Äôm not sure..anyway i love this game i love the characters and i hope that i will eventually play the full gameüíñ.five stars!

I just got it since it‚Äôs free so I‚Äôm still considering whether to buy it. My one major criticism is that the dialogue moves waaaaaay too fast!!!! And since that impacts the story, it‚Äôs a pain because so feel like I‚Äôm skipping major plot developments because I didn‚Äôt press something on time. This is my 3rd time deleting the app in the past 15minutes because of the dialogue speed....

title.label: If you‚Äôre having second thoughts, buy it anyway

content.label: By far the absolute best game I have played on any platform.

I opted to give the trial version a quick play, and I am glad I did so. After making it through the trial version episode, I opted to buy the game, and it is worth every cent. I am still playing the adventure, and it is time well spent and enjoyed. I will not ruin it for anyone else by posting spoilers, but just make good use of the radio (you will figure it and understand my meaning if you decide to play). What more can I say other than 100% satisfied beyond any doubt! Cheers!

I very rarely pay money for games but this was definitely worth every last penny. I played the entire game in one sitting, highly recommend to anyone looking for a thriller that will leave them thinking long after the game has ended.
Played the demo and bought full game. Very interested so far. I‚Äôd like to play with my Xbox One controller but while the joysticks work, the buttons don‚Äôt. Would love to see a fix for this.

I‚Äôm the type of person who plays games for 14 hours a day when I have the chance. I love gaming. When I saw this game I figured I‚Äôd download it and just play when I was bored. But holy FRICK I loved playing this game. I couldn‚Äôt put it down until I had finished it, and now I want to go through and play through every different way I can!! I love that it tells such an interesting story, the concept of the game is different from any game I‚Äôve played recently. 
The controls for the game are pretty simple and easy to get a grip on, the story is well told, and it isn‚Äôt cheesy or anything like that. 
I never really write reviews but I HAD to come and share how awesome this game was. 

Thank you to the creators for this game! AMAZING art, amazing voice actors!
I can‚Äôt stop playing it! The best app I have ever seen!!!really good game!
This game has an amazing story with multiple endings and variations between choices. Tons of replay ability
Good for the price

I haven‚Äôt finished the game, and I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôm close to the end, but so far this game has been amazing. The only negative thing I have to say is that at one point my character refused to move, and I had to open and close the game a few times before it finally cooperated. I haven‚Äôt run into anything like that since. Also, the radio mechanic is awesome and reminds me of a spirit box. The game is beautiful and definitely worth the $5. I‚Äôm so excited to see where the story goes next!
Everything great but game is too short

First off let‚Äôs start with I just got it yesterday and I‚Äôm on the cave part but I can‚Äôt pass it so please tell me how to pass it so I can move on! It‚Äôs really great it lets you choose your story! Just like in real life! I have to force myself to put my stuff down and I need to learn to ride my bike! That‚Äôs how much I love it! I can tell you spend a lot of time on this game! It‚Äôs perfect! I have been looking for a app like this! It‚Äôs better then roblox! Please don‚Äôt do anything to this game! It‚Äôs already perfect the way it is! Thank you for reading my long review!

title.label: One of the Best Games I‚Äôve ever played

content.label: How do I even begin to describe this game? From the amazing graphic design and visual art, to the interchangeable plot and characters, this game has it all. At first glance it may look simple, just another teen horror game, but it is SO much more than that. I‚Äôve played 2 times, now playing for a 3rd time, and even in the 3rd playthrough I have discovered things and dialogue that I didn‚Äôt encounter in the first two playthroughs. I highly recommend playing through this game at least twice, as there is a few new dialogue options, scenes and even a secret ending to round it all out. This game has the potential to be played again and again, and I‚Äôm so many different ways. It has been a true honour to play this game, and I don‚Äôt think there will ever be a choose your own adventure game like this one.
Please
Completely worth the $5! Such a fun game to play, and so many options you can take! But it!
the game looks good but fix controller support almost all buttons don't respond my controller works perfectly fine with other games except of OXENFREE please fix it

This is just wow just WOW! I love the graphics the story... everything I‚Äôm glad I bought the game at firs I was skeptical but it left me on a cliffhanger and I just had to buy it. Gradation game I love it I hope new games similar like this arrive because it‚Äôs just wow!!!!!!!!! AMAZING

I love oxen free!  At first I was skeptical about getting, I read some reviews and thought that they were exaggerating. I got the game and loved it.  I you are on the fence about buying the game like I was, do yourself a favor and get it!

This game has such a good Storyline! I was looking for another choice based game after MineCraft Story-mode was Taken away from the App Store, And OXENFREE showed up. Easy game to run through but is wonderful to repeat. I enjoyed it I got stuck looked up walkthroughs yet still enjoyed it first time through I love that I didn‚Äôt get it the entire first time. Makes it re-playable.

Before playing this game I wasn‚Äôt expecting much since it is on mobile. The art is amazing and the story line is great. I‚Äôm autistic, I‚Äôm bad with words. This game though, it was amazing. It made me feel so many emotions that I hadn‚Äôt really felt, I cried, laughed, and of course got frustrated. The art is amazing and adds on to the game play instead of distracting from it. The sci-fi, horror, diy, genre is amazing. I‚Äôm sorry I can‚Äôt type more, as words fail me. Thank you for creating this.
Beautiful heartbreaking story line. Many Easter eggs... Great gameplay.

I started playing the game at 8pm and didn‚Äôt finish til midnight. That seems like a long time but it went by so fast! I love that no matter what there is no ‚Äúperfect‚Äù ending. title.label: Bought it and now it says I don‚Äôt have it

title.label: Trigger Warning! Other than that, epic!

content.label: Seriously love the game! However, it is a bit scary and there is a bit of suicide included. It may trigger some, but reccomended!

Everything about his game is simply amazing, from its simplistic art style that is also extremely sophisticated, to the variety of options and types of personalities there are in the game. I have only played the demo version and even then I was satisfied. The movement may be wonky sometimes, but it helps that you can always tap where you want to go. The routes you can take and simply the things you can choose to say add so much depth, even in the first minutes. It‚Äôs like Life is Strange and Beyond: Two Souls had a glorious baby together when it made this game.
It won‚Äôt even let me open the all without asking for my Apple ID. I can‚Äôt access the game.

Buy the full version! It is cheap and the story is amazing! The amount of possibilities that come from this story are crazy starting with the beginning, and the ending is phenomenal. I never felt too lost or confused when playing, but still felt challenged. Great game.

So I played the demo game and it looks amazing I love the characters and how you can choose why you want to do but the only problem is that when I try to buy it, It takes me to the game and when I click buy on the game it just sends me to the main menu and yes I already played it again and it asked me to buy it again I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on with it but it won‚Äôt let me buy the full version it‚Äôs really annoying trying to replay the whole thing again and again so I can get to the buy only finding out that it doesn‚Äôt work other than that it seems cool

I honestly loved this game so much! It‚Äôs pretty short but sooo amazing. It has elements of a puzzle game, interactive story game, and horror game and it all around one of my favorite games I‚Äôve ever played :D
clever,intense, spellbinding, it keeps you thinking and the graphics are absolutely breathtaking, i honestly cannot praise this game enough

This game is amazing. Why?
The music is amazingly made, sure it can be repetitive, but it really adds to the mood of the game and added with the background can portray many feelings easier than using dialogue.
The dialogue.
The dialogue in this game is so amazing. No spelling errors! All the sentences flow and you can even disrupt conversations.
The mystery and plot of this game, oh, it‚Äôs so amazing. Every twist and turn you take there‚Äôs a surprise, I love it. This game doesn‚Äôt disappoint.
I think this game is definitely worth the 5 dollars I payed!
+ I used this game on the iPad Pro, it works. Not sure on iPhones tho, last update was a year ago.
